title: 5.4 Master Challenge 2
question:
Refer to the following data and prepare a similar worksheet in Excel to calculate the perimeter and area of a square and a rectangle. In the column Shape, the shape is identifi ed, based on the specifi ed dimensions.
Also modify the formula of perimeter and area to check if only numeric values are entered in columns A and B, using the logical operators.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
